original_text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek, and Latin, and Hebrew, This Is The King Of The Jews.
korean_text: 그의 위에 이는 유대인의 왕이라 쓴 패가 있더라

sentences.original_text: And a superscription also was written over him
in letters of Greek, and Latin, and Hebrew
This Is The King Of The Jews
